title: Biomimicry in action
description: Janine Benyus has a message for inventors: When solving a design problem, look to nature first. There you'll find inspired designs for making things waterproof, aerodynamic, solar-powered and more. Here she reveals dozens of new products that take their cue from nature with spectacular results.
author: Janine Benyus
keywords: TED, talks, biodiversity, biology, biomimicry, biotech, creativity, design, innovation, invention, nature
